scripts.dep:modules: depcruise --collapse "^(servers|frameworks|core)" servers --output-type dot | dot -T svg > results/deps/modules.svg
scripts.dep:core: depcruise --collapse "^(servers|frameworks|modules)" servers --output-type dot | dot -T svg > results/deps/core.svg
scripts.dep:core-gateway: depcruise --collapse "^(servers|frameworks|modules|core/main)" servers --output-type dot | dot -T svg > results/deps/core_gateway.svg
scripts.dep:core-gateway2: depcruise --collapse "^(servers|frameworks|modules|core/main|core/gateway/src/domain|core/gateway/src/application/services|core/gateway/src/application/security)" servers --output-type dot | dot -T svg > results/deps/core_gateway2.svg
scripts.dep:core-main: depcruise --collapse "^(servers|frameworks|modules|core/gateway)" servers --output-type dot | dot -T svg > results/deps/core_main.svg
scripts.dep:frameworks: depcruise --collapse "^(servers|core|modules)" servers --output-type dot | dot -T svg > results/deps/frameworks.svg
scripts.dep:server-local: depcruise --collapse "^(frameworks|core|modules)" servers/local --output-type dot | dot -T svg > results/deps/server_local.svg
scripts.dep:servers: depcruise --collapse "^(frameworks|core|modules)" servers --output-type dot | dot -T svg > results/deps/servers.svg
scripts.dep:all: depcruise servers --output-type dot | dot -T svg > results/deps/all.svg
